welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Hampton, a historic city known for its beautiful architecture and rich culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all it has to offer."

restaurants.name: Las Olas Taqueria
restaurants.description: Las Olas Taqueria is a taco restaurant located in Hampton.

restaurants.name: The Old Salt at Lamie's Inn
restaurants.description: The Old Salt at Lamie's Inn is a american restaurant located in Hampton.
restaurants.address: 490 Lafayette Rd (at Exeter Rd), Hampton, NH 03842

restaurants.name: Hoaty's of Hampton
restaurants.description: Hoaty's of Hampton is a breakfast spot located in Hampton.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Hampton.

restaurants.name: Galley Hatch Restaurant
restaurants.description: Galley Hatch Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in Hampton.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger comfort.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the network and entering a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private aviation flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the second busiest terminal, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
